name: Uses of COMP Token
content: Overview of Usage of COMP Token

steps.name: Governance Power
steps.content: COMP holders can propose and vote on protocol changes, shaping its parameters and functionality through a decentralized governance model.

steps.name: Community Participation
steps.content: This governance approach ensures that decisions are made collectively and that the community's voice is heard.

steps.name: Weighted Voting Power
steps.content: The more COMP a user has in their wallet, the more weight their vote will have on a proposal.

steps.name: Economic Incentives
steps.content: Governance capabilities create economic incentives for COMP holders, driving active involvement in protocol governance and ecosystem growth.
